divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside dto get something from my truck when I came back toward the house I saw in the western sky a strng of orange lights not in a straight line but like a long line of helecopters in a staggered line. There was no noise coming from them and the were going about the speed you would expect a medium height airplane, all the ame speed.I called my wife out and she aw and watched them go overhead and one by one blink out. My wife said they looked like fire embers in color and looks but all moved in a straight direction West to East, appeared to be increasing elevation because you could see them going behind clouds and then out again. I kept looking around the rest of the sky for anything else but saw nothing and there was no noise coming from the objects
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Webster
There were no other sightings in Webster on or around July 22nd 2012
Summary: silent orange lights,12 to 15moving slowly from west to east. blinked out one at a time when directly overhead, also going above broken clouds
